001package org.parboiled.examples.indenting;
002
003import org.parboiled.Rule;
004import org.parboiled.annotations.BuildParseTree;
005import org.parboiled.parser.BaseParser;
006
007@BuildParseTree
008public class SimpleIndent extends BaseParser<IndentNode> {
009
010        Rule Parent() {
011                return Sequence(push(new IndentNode("root")), OneOrMore(Data()), EOI);
012        }
013
014        Rule Data() {
015                return Sequence(Identifier(), push(new IndentNode(match())), peek(1)
016                                .addChild(peek()),
017                                Optional(Sequence(Spacing(), ChildNodeList())), drop());
018        }
019
020        Rule ChildNodeList() {
021                return Sequence(INDENT, Spacing(), OneOrMore(Data(), Spacing()), DEDENT);
022        }
023
024        Rule Identifier() {
025                return Sequence(PN_CHARS_U(), ZeroOrMore(PN_CHARS_DIGIT_U()));
026        }
027
028        public Rule PN_CHARS_DIGIT_U() {
029                return FirstOf(PN_CHARS_U(), DIGIT());
030        }
031
032        public Rule PN_CHARS_U() {
033                return FirstOf(PN_CHARS_BASE(), '_');
034        }
035
036        public Rule PN_CHARS_BASE() {
037                return FirstOf( 
038                                CharRange('A', 'Z'),
039                                CharRange('a', 'z'), 
040                                CharRange('\u00C0', '\u00D6'), 
041                                CharRange('\u00D8', '\u00F6'), 
042                                CharRange('\u00F8', '\u02FF'), 
043                                CharRange('\u0370', '\u037D'), 
044                                CharRange('\u037F', '\u1FFF'), 
045                                CharRange('\u200C', '\u200D'), 
046                                CharRange('\u2070', '\u218F'), 
047                                CharRange('\u2C00', '\u2FEF'), 
048                                CharRange('\u3001', '\uD7FF'), 
049                                CharRange('\uF900', '\uFDCF'), 
050                                CharRange('\uFDF0', '\uFFFD') 
051                );
052        }
053
054        public Rule DIGIT() {
055                return CharRange('0', '9');
056        }
057
058        Rule Spacing() {
059                return ZeroOrMore(AnyOf(" \t\r\n\f").label("Whitespace"));
060        }
061}
